de.mpg.biochem.mars.io

Interface MoleculeArchiveStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MoleculeArchiveSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoleculeArchiveAmazonS3Source, MoleculeArchiveFSSource

    public interface MoleculeArchiveStorage
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Location where Molecule Archives are stored. Follows structure of N5Source.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      • exists

        boolean exists(java.lang.String pathName)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Test whether a group or dataset exists at a given path.
        Parameters:
        pathName - group path
        Returns:
        true if the path exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if the source is not accessible

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        list of children
        Throws:

      • deepList

        default java.lang.String[] deepList(java.lang.String pathName,
                                    java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Recursively list all groups and datasets in the given path. Only paths that satisfy the provided filter will be included, but the children of paths that were excluded may be included (filter does not apply to the subtree).
        Parameters:
        pathName - base group path
        filter - filter for children to be included
        Returns:
        list of child groups and datasets
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if pathName is not a valid group

      • deepList

        default java.lang.String[] deepList(java.lang.String pathName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Recursively list all groups and datasets in the given path.
        Parameters:
        pathName - base group path
        Returns:
        list of groups and datasets
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if pathName is not a valid group

      • deepList

        static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> deepList(MoleculeArchiveStorage store,
                                                      java.lang.String pathName,
                                                      java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Helper method to recursively list all groups and datasets. This method is not part of the public API and is accessible only because Java 8 does not support private interface methods yet. TODO make private when committing to Java versions newer than 8
        Parameters:
        store - the MoleculeArchiveStore reader
        pathName - the base group path
        filter - a dataset filter
        Returns:
        the list of all children
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if pathName is not a valid group

      • deepList

        default java.lang.String[] deepList(java.lang.String pathName,
                                    java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter,
                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Recursively list all groups (including datasets) in the given group, in parallel, using the given ExecutorService. Only paths that satisfy the provided filter will be included, but the children of paths that were excluded may be included (filter does not apply to the subtree).
        Parameters:
        pathName - base group path
        filter - filter for children to be included
        executor - executor service
        Returns:
        list of datasets
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if pathName is not a valid group
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - the execution exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • deepList

        default java.lang.String[] deepList(java.lang.String pathName,
                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                    java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Recursively list all groups (including datasets) in the given group, in parallel, using the given ExecutorService.
        Parameters:
        pathName - base group path
        executor - executor service
        Returns:
        list of groups
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception is thrown if pathName is not a valid group
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - the execution exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - this exception is thrown if execution is interrupted

      • deepListHelper

        static void deepListHelper(MoleculeArchiveStorage store,
                           java.lang.String path,
                           java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> filter,
                           java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor,
                           java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String>> datasetFutures)
        Helper method for parallel deep listing. This method is not part of the public API and is accessible only because Java 8 does not support private interface methods yet. TODO make private when committing to Java versions newer than 8
        Parameters:
        store - the MoleculeArchiveStore reader
        path - the base path
        filter - filter for datasets to be included
        executor - the executor service
        datasetFutures - result futures

      • getGroupSeparator

        default java.lang.String getGroupSeparator()
        Returns the symbol that is used to separate nodes in a group path.
        Returns:
        the group separator

      • groupPath

        default java.lang.String groupPath(java.lang.String... nodes)
        Creates a group path by concatenating all nodes with the node separator defined by getGroupSeparator(). The string will not have a leading or trailing node separator symbol.
        Parameters:
        nodes - a collection of child node names
        Returns:
        the full group path

      • close

        default void close()
        Default implementation of AutoCloseable.close() for all implementations that do not hold any closable resources.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
